item.title: SDKMan for Linux - Bash, Zsh, and Fish Shell
item.description: If you are a developer, working mainly with Java, you will notice that so many things need to be done in order to install and stay updated with Java ecosystem and development tools. There’s a tool called https://sdkman.io which can be used to handle installation, configuration, remove, and update all those Java-base software easier. It can be used on major platform (Linux, Windows, Mac) and makes our live as (Java platform) developer easier.
